user_instruction: 'Send Sarah an update on Project Falcon (sarah@apexmarketing.com). You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["sarah@apexmarketing.com"],"subject":"Project Falcon – Quick Progress Update","body":"Hi Sarah,

Hope you're doing well.

Here’s a brief update on Project Falcon:

• Creative assets: final drafts are now in production and progressing smoothly.
• Media planning: the schedule has been finalized and folded into the overall rollout calendar.
• Marketing materials: early feedback from our test groups remains very positive.
• Social media: I’ve incorporated the adjustments you suggested; we can walk through the draft posts during our next team meeting.

Next steps I’m focusing on:
• Confirming the launch timeline once the last internal sign-offs come through.
• Pulling together an operational checklist to make sure cross-team hand-offs go seamlessly.

Let me know if there’s anything else you need me to cover before our upcoming check-in.

Thanks for keeping the momentum going!

Best,
John"}
